title: When the heck did things on GD get this thin-skinned to where saying 'bronzie talk' isn't allowed?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/ZIYqmZg.png/img

https://i.imgur.com/AjSr6F0.png/img

If this sort of action was something in Gameplay or another board section where the rules are more strict, I'd understand then

But this sort of thing has been well alright within GD's slightly more open rule set and much worse has been allowed for _years_

You're getting pretty damn ridiculous, confusing and very vague on what is allowed to say here and what isn't mods 

What's next?

People are allowed to backtalk Diamonds again?
